00018 /** @file convenience.h
00019  *
00020  * Convenience function for regularly used actions
00021  */
00022 
00023 #ifndef CONVENIENCE_H_
00024 #define CONVENIENCE_H_
00025 
00026 #include <inttypes.h>
00027 #include "motor.h"
00028 
00029 
00030 /** Move motor to absolute position */
00031 int tmcl_move_to_pos_abs(TMCLMotor *motor, int position);
00032 
00033 /** Move motor relative to current position */
00034 int tmcl_move_to_pos_rel(TMCLMotor *motor, int position);
00035 
00036 /** Move to previously stored coordinate See TMCL reference for details */
00037 int tmcl_move_to_coord(TMCLMotor *motor, int coordinate);
00038 
00039 /** Stop motor */
00040 int tmcl_stop(TMCLMotor *motor);
00041 
00042 /** Start reference search */
00043 int tmcl_refsearch_start(TMCLMotor *motor);
00044 
00045 /** Stop reference search */
00046 int tmcl_refsearch_stop(TMCLMotor *motor);
00047 
00048 /** Get status of reference search
00049  *
00050  * \return
00051  *      -  1 when reference search is running
00052  *      -  0 when no reference search is running
00053  *      - -1 on error
00054  */
00055 int tmcl_refsearch_status(TMCLMotor *motor);
00056 
00057 /** Get current position of motor */
00058 int32_t tmcl_get_position(TMCLMotor *motor);
00059 
00060 /** Rotate motor right */
00061 int tmcl_ror(TMCLMotor *motor, int velocity);
00062 
00063 /** Rotate motor left */
00064 int tmcl_rol(TMCLMotor *motor, int velocity);
00065 
00066 /** Set maximum current
00067  *
00068  * \param[in] current in percent of full current
00069  */
00070 int tmcl_set_max_current(TMCLMotor *motor, unsigned int percent);
00071 
00072 /** Get maximum current
00073  *
00074  * \return
00075  *      - current in percent of available full current
00076  *      - -1 on error
00077  */
00078 int tmcl_get_max_current(TMCLMotor *motor);
00079 
00080 /** Set maximum standby current
00081  *
00082  * \param[in] maximum standby current in percent
00083  *
00084  */
00085 int tmcl_set_max_standby_current(TMCLMotor *motor, unsigned int percent);
00086 
00087 /** Get maximum standby current
00088  *
00089  * \return
00090  *      - current in percent of available full current
00091  *      - -1 on error
00092 */
00093 int tmcl_get_max_standby_current(TMCLMotor *motor);
00094 
00095 /** Set microsteps for movement
00096  *
00097  * \note not for TMCM100 model
00098  *
00099  * \param[in] microsteps 0 (full step mode), 1 (half step mode), 2, 4, 8, 16, 32, 64 microsteps
00100  */
00101 int tmcl_set_microsteps(TMCLMotor *motor, int microsteps);
00102 
00103 /** Get used microsteps
00104  *
00105  * \note not for TMCM100 model
00106  *
00107  * \return
00108  *          - microsteps: 0 (full step mode), 1 (half step mode), 2, 4, 8, 16, 32, 64 microsteps
00109  *          - -1 on failure
00110  */
00111 int tmcl_get_microsteps(TMCLMotor *motor);
00112 
00113 /** Activate limit switch
00114  *
00115  * \param[in] limit_switch ID of limit switch to activate
00116  *
00117  * \return
00118  *      -  0 on success
00119  *      - -1 on failure
00120  */
00121 int tmcl_activate_limit_switch(TMCLMotor *motor, int limit_switch);
00122 
00123 /** Deactivate limit switch
00124  *
00125  * \param[in] limit_switch ID of limit switch to deactivate
00126  *
00127  * \return
00128  *      -  0 on success
00129  *      - -1 on failure
00130  */
00131 int tmcl_deactivate_limit_switch(TMCLMotor *motor, int limit_switch);
00132 
00133 /** Check if limit switch is active
00134  *
00135  * \param[in] limit_switch Switch to check
00136  *
00137  * \return
00138  *          -  1 when \c limit_switch is active
00139  *          -  0 when not active
00140  *          - -1 on error
00141  */
00142 int tmcl_get_limit_switch(TMCLMotor *motor, int limit_switch);
00143 
00144 /** Set number of reference switches
00145  *
00146  * \param[in] number Number of reference switches (1-3)
00147  *
00148  * \return
00149  *      -  0 on success
00150  *      - -1 on failure
00151  */
00152 int tmcl_set_no_ref_switch(TMCLMotor *motor, int number);
00153 
00154 /** Get current speed of motor
00155  *
00156  * \return
00157  *      - >=0: current speed of motor
00158  *      - -1 on failure
00159  *
00160  */
00161 int tmcl_get_current_speed(TMCLMotor *motor);
00162 
00163 /** Set reference search speed
00164  *
00165  * \param[in] fraction Set reference search speed to 1/fraction of positioning speed
00166  */
00167 int tmcl_set_refsearch_speed(TMCLMotor *motor, int fraction);
00168 
00169 /** Get reference search speed
00170  *
00171  * \return
00172  *      - >=0: reference search speed in fraction of positioning speed
00173  *      - -1: failure
00174  */
00175 int tmcl_get_refsearch_speed(TMCLMotor *motor);
00176 
00177 /** Set positioning speed
00178  *
00179  * \param[in] speed Positioning speed 0-2047
00180  *
00181  * \return
00182  *      -  0 on success
00183  *      - -1 on failure
00184  */
00185 int tmcl_set_pos_speed(TMCLMotor *motor, int speed);
00186 
00187 /** Get positioning speed */
00188 int tmcl_get_pos_speed(TMCLMotor *motor);
00189 
00190 /** Get status of limit switch
00191  *
00192  * \param[in] limit_switch Limit switch to check  0: left switch, 1: right switch
00193  *
00194  * \return
00195  *      -  0: when limit switch is open
00196  *      -  1: when limit switch is closed
00197  *      - -1: on failure
00198  */
00199 int tmcl_get_limit_status(TMCLMotor *motor, int limit_switch);
00200 
00201 #endif /* CONVENIENCE_H_ */
